 TITLE Tofu Larb

 # Drain and press [28 oz extra-firm tofu]
    
 {[Rice Powder]
    # In a small skillet toast [3 tbl jasmine rice] until golden
    # Transfer to a morter and grind into a coarse powder.
 }
 
 {[Dressing]
    # In a small bowl combine:{[4 tbl fresh lime juice][3 tbl brown sugar][2 tbl tamari][1 item bird's eye chili[, finely chopped]][1 item lemongrass[, finely chopped]][1 item shallot[, finely chopped]]}
 }      

# Chop [1/3 cup mint][1/3 cup thai basil][1/3 cup cilantro]
# Combine [4 cup spinach], tofu, herbs. 
# Top with $[Dressing], $[Rice Powder] and [1/4 cup crispy fried shallots]
